column2: naturelover, 65-74 Female  (Patient)
column9: This is the only medication that helped me.  It was a miracle.  I'm now so miserable and it's always in my mind that I cannot have a bowel movement.  My doctor prescribed amitiza which is inordinately expensive and it does not work.  Between taking amitiza, various laxatives (miralax does not work), suppositories, enemas, etc. I'm still miserable.  I don't have heart problems and I can't see why I should suffer for people who have a heart problem.  I'm going to try to get zelnorm again overseas.

column1: Chronic Difficulty having a Bowel Movement

column1: Constipation Predominant Irritable Colon
column2: CaboGirl4vr, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: BRING ZELNORM BACK!!!! I'd sign any waiver they want me to just to feel the relief Zelnorm gave me from my IBS-C.  For 3 glorious years, constipation, bloating, tenderness, pressure, and pain were non-existent.  For the first time in 30 years, it became a non-issue, totally symptom free.  I lost 30 pounds, I could zip with no pain, no gas, no pressure; hemorrhoids, nausea, sluggishness - went away - gone AND I could enjoy sex again with no discomfort -the quality of my life increased 100%.  There's nothing out there that I haven't tried; Amitiza, herbal teas, high-higher fiber foods, fiber additives to drinks, drinking enough water to drowned myself, and participated in 2 drug trials for IBS-C - nothing has offered any relief.I WANT MY ZELNORM!!

column1: Chronic Difficulty having a Bowel Movement
column2: Jennifer, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I wish they would bring Zelnorn back!  It changed my life.  I would go weeks without going to the bathroom and as soon as I took this medicine, it worked.  I even lost 25lbs in 2 months, just from the medicine.  Birth Control has serious side effects and I am fine with that.  Why can't they plop the side effects on the label and if you are alright with it, then take it.  Just because someone has a heart attack or a stroke while taking this medicine should not be a reason for us all to suffer.  Heart attacks can be caused by a number of reasons.  I wish they would bring it back.

column9: I am a man and was given samples when it first came out.  Before Zelnorm I had to tale a laxative 2 times a week or get violently sick and throw up for as long as 36 hours. column9: I have been suffering with IBS for years during which time I tried every special IBS diet and natural product that I could lay my hands on.  I tried everything my doctor prescribed, but it seemed that the more medication I took the worse my symptoms got. In the end I was never  without pain.I woke up with pain and I went to bed with pain. At that stage I have also developed depression as a result of my constant pain. Then my doctor prescribed Zelnorm. To me it was like a miracle. It changed my life completely and I couldn't believe how fantastic it worked. Ever since it was taken off the market my suffering has started all over again. I have now been in agony and pain for about the last 2 years. PLEASE, is there no way that this medication can come back onto the market and that it can then be prescribed under controlled doctor's supervision??
